ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR( ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Contract Signed"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Enrolled"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Fees Done"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "NSF"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Cancelled") ), OR( ISBLANK(Amount), ISBLANK(Fronter__c),ISBLANK(Case_Manager__c), ISBLANK(Closer__c), ISBLANK(First_Draft_Date__c), ISBLANK(TEXT(Program_Type__c)) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: When the Stage is set to 'Contract Signed', the Amount, First draft date, Fronter, Closer, Program Type and Case Manager fields must be filled.
